name: ms1typescrypt
description: Visual items to Design - Game Board - Start screen - High score screen - Mine Tile (hidden) - Mine Tile (bomb) - Mine Tile (number) - Winning Screen - Name for the game - Logo - How many tiles do we want in our game? - How do we want the game to look?     Classic     Windows XP Style?     New? - MAKE IT RESEMBLE A MINEFIELD - Do we want a background?     Can we do something i the back ground to add immersion in the game?
